name: love (itch) (piratescarfy)
description:
haven't made a game in a long long long long time but I love the simplicity of bitsy. this is a short love letter to my boyfriend.

it's great to come back to the indie scene and see so many examples of these pick-up-and-make game makers. it's a far cry from traditional programming and i am so delighted to see the opportunities these tools create.
